english.segment1: From the rising sun. To the end of the day. Your name will be praised, Jesus. Your name will be praised
english.segment2: From the prophets of old. To the mouths of babes. Your name will be praised, Jesus. Your name will be praised
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. Glory to You, exalted One. Who gave Your life away. Glory to You, our Risen King. Jesus, Your name will be praised. Your name will be praised
english.segment4: For the gift of new life. For your mercy each day. Your name will be praised, Jesus. Your name will be praised
english.segment5: Through the darkest of nights. When we cant find our way. We will walk by faith not sight, Lord. Your name will be praised
english.segment6: For who You are. For what Youve done. For what Youve yet to do. This song we raise. This day we proclaim, all glory to you?.
